column1: Smoque BBQ////Despite the spic and span interior
column2: both of my experiences were very good and I will be going back at some point.  However
column3: Smoque definitely lacks something.  I guess I want a "BBQ Joint" and Smoque comes off as a "Barbecue Restaurant".   I'm afraid to say that Chicago will most likely never be able to compete with Kansas City
column5: and the Carolinas for the best BBQ joints.  But if you are looking for some good Chicago BBQ Smoque will get you close.
